InduceDreamsSuccessCooldown.Description: [Not Used] Cooldown for successfully putting a survivor to sleep

PutToSleepMaxDistance.Description: Max distance a survivor can be for killer to put them to sleep

KillerGlimpseDuration.Description: The duration for which the killer glimpse is revealed

GeneratorTeleportSuccessCooldown.Description: Cooldown on teleport if it was successful

GeneratorTeleportCancelledCooldown.Description: Cooldown on teleport if it was cancelled early

GeneratorTeleportPercentCooldownReductio.Description: Fraction of the cooldown reduced per survivor in dreamworld

DreamPalletPlacementRange.Description: Maximum range at which Freddy can call upon a dream pallet

DreamPalletIndicatorRange.Description: Distance at which pallet snap points indicator start appearing

DreamPalletPlacementAngle.Description: Max Angle from the center of the camera for placing dream pallets

DreamSnareMinimumChargeTime.Description: Minimum time before being able to place the trap

DreamSnareSlowDuration.Description: How long does the slow linger

DreamSnareTriggeredDuration.Description: How long does the trap stays active after being stepped on

ClockSleepinessProtectionDuration.Description: Time without gaining sleepiness after using a clock to wake up

FullVisibleDistanceMax.Description: max distance where Freddy should be completely visible (not fading in)

BlackBoxBlockDuration.Description: Time the black box addon stops the player from escaping on each gate
